Question.Subject: Onlien flash slideshow creator?
Question.Content: I need to find a flash slideshow creator that is free and no download. I found one a while ago. But I lost it. I don't want one with special effects. Just like 5 pictures put together that move fast. The one I found had an example, it was a stuffed dog getting closer and closer to the screen. That one was easy to use and no download! If you know what website I'm talking about, please tell me that one. But If not, just give me a website that I can use: NO special effects, NO download
Question.ChosenAnswer:
I highly recommend iPixSoft Flash Slideshow Creator, it can help you to make flash slideshow flash banner, slideshow album, photo gallery for web design and share online easily but not a free program.
In addition, its official website provides step by step tutorial such as
Make a Graduation Slideshow Album with Music http://www.ipixsoft.com/flash-gallery-tutorial/graduation-slideshow-album.html
Make a Christmas Ornaments Photo Presentation with Hyperlink http://www.ipixsoft.com/flash-gallery-tutorial/christmas-ornaments-photo-presentation.html
Make a Christmas Photo Album with Music http://www.ipixsoft.com/flash-slideshow-tutorial/christmas-photo-album.html
Make a Flash Slideshow with Music http://www.ipixsoft.com/flash-slideshow-tutorial.html
Make a flash banner for webpage with hyperlink http://www.ipixsoft.com/flash-banner-tutorial.html
Make a Valentine's Day Slideshow with Music http://www.ipixsoft.com/flash-gallery-tutorial/vanlentine-day-slideshow.html

Answer.Content:
I am sorry that i can't help you if you mean create a photo tile through the internet. However, if you are interested in downloading a software. I can recommend you a nice one. Using that one, you can add all kinds of transitions, decorations like caption, background music, etc. between photos.
Have a try, I guess you will like it. http://www.etinysoft.com/slideshow-photo-movietheater.html

I highly recommend iPixSoft Flash Slideshow Creator, it can help you to make flash slideshow flash banner, slideshow album, photo gallery for web design and share online easily but not a free program.
